extendedInfo.description: â IMPORTANT - This is a limited trial version, go PRO for unlimited access âThrow away your song books and start jamming with GuitarTapp today! Search and view 500,000+ guitar tabs, chords, ChordPro files, power tabs, bass tabs and drum tabs. Has autoscroll feature, large chords dictionary with diagrams and variations, save, open and edit tabs on SD card, transpose songs, create setlists, jam along with local MP3's and watch YouTube video lessons.GuitarTapp is the only tab viewer capable of adjusting tabs to fit your screen's width, using the innovative IntelliWrap technique: this eliminates the need to scroll horizontally. Main features:â Quickly find chords, guitar tabs, power tabs, bass tabs and drum tabs for 350,000+ songsâ Shows predictive search suggestionsâ Autoscroll: play along from the screen, using the song's duration to determine scroll speedâ On-board chord dictionary: view chord diagrams and fingering alternatives for hundreds of guitar and ukulele chords, includes left-handed support. â Able to play the chords for referenceâ Transpose: quickly change the song key by transposing the chords up or downâ IntelliWrap: eliminates horizontal scrolling by intelligently breaking up tabs and chords into screen-sized piecesâ Able to play text tablature for quick referenceâ Favorites: save tabs on your SD cardâ Setlists: create and manage setlists for live performancesâ Power Tab support (are converted to text tabs)â ChordPro rendering engine for PDF-alike scoresâ NEW metronomeâ Find songs or video lessons on YouTubeâ Save and load tabs to/from SD card, and edit them!â Open your own filesâ 'White on black' option available for tab viewing; reduces battery consumption for some screensâ Portrait and landscape modes supportedâ Adjustable tabs font sizeâ Supports tablets: very useful as teleprompter / autocue for live performances on stageâ Bluetooth pedals support for handsfree scrolling, turning pages, loading next song on setlist etcâ Sync: synchronize your favorites and setlists to other devices running GuitarTappâ Send to e-mailThis trial version is limited to 20 tab views. Go PRO to get unlimited access to Android's ultimate guitar tabs collection! Additional keywords: Guitar Tabs, OnSong, SongBook.â IMPORTANT: Please e-mail us if you run into a bug, or have questions. Do NOT ask questions in a review, as we are unable to reply to you! â

reviews.title: I have never seen so annoying slider
